lines.text: This release includes 20 Generators and 6 Utility addons.
The TFMSTYLE Addon Collection has an auto-update feature, documentation button for all addons, a supporters tab section, and detachable module option.
If you want to learn more, check out the link below:
Fixed small UI issues and improved loading times.
Added new documentation button to the Chatter addon.
Learn more about this patch here:
